title: Basic Fitness
description: A beginner-friendly fitness program focusing on overall health, stamina, and body balance. Perfect for those new to the gym or returning after a break.

title: New Gym Training
description: An intensive gym program designed to introduce you to modern equipment and form-focused strength training. Stay safe and grow stronger!

title: Basic Muscle Course
description: Target your major muscle groups with this structured course. Includes resistance training and muscle recovery techniques.
